posts.post_content:
For starters, I had no idea that any of those [Cartel Aristocrat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cartel Aristocrat)s were actually vampires, which does a lot to explain their abilities.  
  
I'll be incredibly happy to get one of these if I end up with BGW at the pre-release. Each side of the card is pretty decent in and of itself as a combat trick, but when combined, the card essentially reads, *2GWWB: You're losing? Now you're winning!"*
posts.html:
For starters, I had no idea that any of those Cartel Aristocrats were actually vampires, which does a lot to explain their abilities.

I'll be incredibly happy to get one of these if I end up with BGW at the pre-release. Each side of the card is pretty decent in and of itself as a combat trick, but when combined, the card essentially reads, 2GWWB: You're losing? Now you're winning!"

posts.post_content:
Oh hey look. They yanked one mode off of [Boros Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boros Charm) and glued it to [To Arms!](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=To Arms!) (minus cantrip) and then stapled the whole thing to [Vault of the Archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vault of the Archangel).  
  
That's one scary efficient card with a whoooooole lotta uses.
